name: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou - ExTime
storyline: Kurou Nadeshiko is the twelve year old daughter of some wealthy high class members. She goes to a wealthy school with her childhood friend and hopes become a doctor one day. However, every night she has a dream about being in another world. That world is full of ruins and she is ten years older. One day, a transfer student named Kaido Takato comes to her class and she gets involved in an after school extra-curricular club which they call “Clock Zero”.
summary: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou - ExTime is a port of Clock Zero for PlayStation Vita, it adds new scenarios, new CGs and one extra character route.
